channel.title: Naruto sig :P kinda weird
channel.description:
well i decided to make a sig and i was experimenting with some stuff and this is what i ended with.. i just need a better background. so tell me how to make a better one :) also...
rate it as it is for now 1 - 10

item.title: Naruto sig :P kinda weird
item.dc:creator: @hodunken hodunken
item.description:
@hodunken wrote:

ew, animation idea is nasty… All I can say is, renders are stolen art people call their own… why even use them?
[/quote]

because its what he felt like doing, and they usually look cool…

try using some blending tuts.

Read full topic

item.title: Naruto sig :P kinda weird
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

It’s not high up in my score book, but I’ve seen much much worse. If I were you, I’d try something different for the text, maybe some stroking involved, and a bit of Shadow, as for a background, something Grunge and green (Like the forest, maybe even use some type of grunged forest) might look OK. Possibly add some rain in the background like he’s fighting in the rain. as for the Ripple, like exps said, put the render over top, and maybe add a small shake animation, from left to right on the render. Like he’s fighting.

ew, animation idea is nasty… All I can say is, renders are stolen art people call their own… why even use them?

Read full topic

item.title: Naruto sig :P kinda weird
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

It’s not high up in my score book, but I’ve seen much much worse. If I were you, I’d try something different for the text, maybe some stroking involved, and a bit of Shadow, as for a background, something Grunge and green (Like the forest, maybe even use some type of grunged forest) might look OK. Possibly add some rain in the background like he’s fighting in the rain. as for the Ripple, like exps said, put the render over top, and maybe add a small shake animation, from left to right on the render. Like he’s fighting.

item.title: Naruto sig :P kinda weird
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:4, topic:107075”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=153250.msg1444308#msg1444308 date=1181195695]

One thing to remember when making a sig:
Try not to screw up the render.

This looks very stupid with that ripple or whatever you used. Maybe you can get away with doing this, and adding an untouched version of the render slightly to the right of it.

jackass…
[/quote]
^^ That was spam…

His post was Constructive Criticism, Which helps your make a better sig.[/quote]

true but i was screwing around when i made it lol

.Fusion:

You can do better.

i probably can lol

Read full topic
